src:
Klasemen Sementara Formula 1 2019 usai Seri Austin, Texas
04 Nov 2019, 04:22 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Usai memenangi balapan Formula 1 GP Austin, Texas, Amerika Serikat, di di Circuit of The Americas, Minggu (3/11/2019), pebalap Mercedes AMG Petronas, Lewis Hamilton, kian kokoh di puncak klasemen dengan koleksi 381 poin.
Pebalap Inggris ini pun sukses meraih gelar dunianya yang keenam sejak berkarier di kejuaraan balap mobil terakbar tersebut pada 2007 lalu.
Hamilton diikuti oleh sang tandem, Valtteri Bottas, di peringkat kedua dengan 314 poin, dan pebalap Scuderia Ferrari, Charles Leclerc, di peringkat ketiga dengan 249 poin.
Sementara itu peringkat keempat dan kelima masing-masing ditempati oleh pebalap Aston Martin Red Bull Racing Honda, Max Verstappen, dengan 235 poin, dan pebalap Scuderia Ferrari, Sebastian Vettel, dengan 230 poin.
Berikut klasemen sementara Formula 1 2019 usai Seri Austin.
text:
Formula 1 Formula 1 Standings 2019 after the Austin, Texas Series
Nov 04 2019, 04:22 by Bola.net
After winning the Formula 1 GP GP Austin, Texas, United States, at the Circuit of The Americas on Sunday (11/03/2019), Mercedes AMG Petronas racer, Lewis Hamilton, increasingly firmly at the top of the standings with a collection of 381 points .
This British rider also successfully won his sixth world title since a career in the grandest car racing championship in 2007.
Hamilton was followed by the tandem, Valtteri Bottas, ranked second with 314 points, and Scuderia Ferrari's Charles Leclerc, ranked third with 249 points.
Meanwhile, the fourth and fifth places were each occupied by Aston Martin Red Bull Racing Honda driver Max Verstappen, with 235 points, and Scuderia Ferrari's Sebastian Vettel, with 230 points.
Following are the Formula 1 2019 standings after the Austin Series.
